title: Cheng Chang Riji
synopsis: Ah Wei and Da Zhuang's family live in the same community. Ah Wei’s father is a computer animator and his mother is a doctor. They adopt an educational attitude of equality, mutual love, encouragement and tolerance towards Ah Wei. The big and strong father is the boss of the big company, and the mother is the housewife. They always meet all the material requirements of the child, but do not pay attention to the inner world of the child. Children from these two families will always react completely differently when encountering the same thing. The story of the film arouses parents' thinking. (translated from youku)
